mapper.sql: SELECT p.id, p.bill_id AS billId, p.purchase_company_id AS purchaseComId, pbc.cname AS purchaseComName, p.purchase_dept_id AS purDeptId, p.recieve_org_id AS recOrgId, o.cname AS recOrgName, o.code AS recOrgCode, p.prov_id AS provId, rbc.cname AS provName, p.sub_prov_id as subProvId, srbc.cname As subProvName, p.delivery_relation AS distrRelation, p.fillter, fuo.ename AS fillterName, p.remark, p.status AS status, p.autitor_id AS autitorId, auo.cname AS autitorName, p.autitor_sumrow AS autitorSumRow, p.sum_row AS sumRow, p.sum_amount sumAmount, p.sum_tax_amount sumTaxAmount, p.fill_date AS fillDate, p.last_update_datetime AS lastUpdateDt, p.version, p.flag, p.pur_kind AS purKind, p.pur_type AS purType, p.rec_address_id recAddressId, p.rec_linkman recLinkman, p.rec_linkman_phone recLinkmanPhone, p.rec_address recAddress, p.last_arrival_date lastArrivalDate, pbc.CODE AS purComCode, purOrg. CODE AS purOrgCode, purOrg.cname AS purOrgCname, pdic.erp_code as purOrgErpCode, purOrg.scm_code AS purOrgScmCode, pdic_rec.erp_code as recOrgErpCode, o.scm_code AS recOrgScmCode, rbc.CODE AS provCode, rbc.erp_code AS provErpCode, srbc.code as subProvCode, srbc.erp_code As subProvErpCode, phic.erp_code as purComErpCode FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN bas_company_info pbc ON p.purchase_company_id = pbc.id LEFT JOIN sys_org o ON o.id = p.recieve_org_id LEFT JOIN bas_company_info rbc ON p.prov_id = rbc.id LEFT JOIN bas_company_info srbc ON p.sub_prov_id = srbc.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_org fuo ON p.fillter = fuo.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_org auo ON p.autitor_id = auo.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_org purOrg ON p.purchase_dept_id = purOrg.id LEFT JOIN prov_hos_info_code phic ON p.purchase_company_id = phic.hos_id and p.prov_id = phic.prov_id LEFT JOIN prov_hos_dept_info_code pdic ON pdic.prov_id =p.prov_id and pdic.hos_id=p.purchase_company_id and pdic.hos_dept_id=p.purchase_dept_id LEFT JOIN prov_hos_dept_info_code pdic_rec ON pdic_rec.prov_id =p.prov_id and pdic_rec.hos_id=p.purchase_company_id and pdic_rec.hos_dept_id=p.recieve_org_id

sysdate()
sysdate
)
